casebody.data:
No. 10-708. First American Financial Corporation, Successor in Interest to The First American Corporation, et al., Petitioners v. Denise P. Edwards. 564 U.S. 1018, 131 S. Ct. 3022,

180 L. Ed. 2d 843,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4668. June 20, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit granted limited to Question 2 presented by the petition.

Same case below, 610 F.3d 514.
